metadata.name: ReFi Tanzania | Onboarding Non-web3 communities
metadata.description:
ReFi Tanzania is building a hub for regeneration in variety of fields such as waste, upcycling and proof of impact. During this period, we managed to onboard non-web3 communities in the form of 10 waste centres and 40 waste pickers to our waste pickers portal, offsetting over 1Tonne+. Can read more at chatafisha.com
We also managed to organize our ReFi event where we went of ReFi concepts as well as the EBF and how it could lead to unlocking economies potential. (https://x.com/ReFiTanzania/status/1731617463542915283)
Year end beach clean-up in Dar es salaam. (https://x.com/ReFiTanzania/status/1756952229104197688)

metadata.name: ReFi Tanzania
metadata.description: ReFi Tanzania is an initiative to create an infrastructure for reducing emissions through waste regeneration in Tanzania that integrates blockchain technology to track impact, redistribute wealth, promote sustainable resource management, financial inclusion as a well as a hub to onboard regeneration projects to Web3.
